thread.title: Trump travel ban: 'President must honour ruling'
thread.title_full: Trump travel ban: 'President must honour ruling'

title: Trump travel ban: 'President must honour ruling'
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Trump travel ban: 'President must honour ruling' 4 February 2017 Last updated at 08:24 GMT 
President Donald Trump must honour the temporary nationwide block on his ban on travellers from seven mainly Muslim nations, the Washington state Attorney General Bob Ferguson has said. 
Earlier, Federal Judge James Robart ruled against government lawyers' claims that US states did not have the standing to challenge Mr Trump's executive order. Read more
